file.name: spec_ringcentral_openapi3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: platform@ringcentral.com
    name: RingCentral Connect Platform
    url: http://developers.ringcentral.com
  description: RingCentral Connect Platform API
  license:
    name: RingCentral API License Agreement and Terms of Use
    url: https://www.ringcentral.com/legal/apilitos.html
  title: RingCentral Connect Platform API
  version: 1.0.39
paths:
  /restapi:
    get:
      description: Returns current API version(s) and server info.
      operationId: readAPIVersions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetVersionsResponse"
      summary: Get API Versions
      tags:
        - API Info
      x-api-group: restapi
      x-auth-required: false
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: Free
      x-throttling-group: NoThrottling
  /restapi/oauth/authorize:
    get:
      description: Returns a link to a login page location.
      operationId: authorize
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                response_type:
                  description: "Determines authorization flow: **code** - Authorization
                    Code, **token** - Implicit Grant"
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - code
                    - token
                redirect_uri:
                  description: This is a callback URI which determines where the response
                    is sent. The value of this parameter must exactly match one
                    of the URIs you have provided for your app upon registration
                  type: string
                client_id:
                  description: Identifier (key) of a client application
                  type: string
                state:
                  description: Client state. Returned back to the client at the end of the
                    flow
                  type: string
                brand_id:
                  description: Brand identifier. If it is not provided in request, server
                    will try to determine brand from client app profile. The
                    default value is '1210' - RingCentral US
                  type: string
                display:
                  description: Style of login form. The default value is 'page'. The
                    'popup' and 'touch' values are featured for mobile
                    applications
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - page
                    - popup
                    - touch
                    - mobile
                prompt:
                  description: "Specifies which login form will be displayed.
                    Space-separated set of the following values: 'login' -
                    official RingCentral login form, 'sso' - Single Sign-On
                    login form, 'consent' - form to show the requested scope and
                    prompt user for consent. Either 'login' or 'sso' (or both)
                    must be specified. The default value is 'login&sso'"
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - login
                    - sso
                    - consent
                localeId:
                  description: Localization code of a language. Overwrites
                    'Accept-Language' header value
                  type: string
                ui_locales:
                  description: Localization code of a language. Overwrites 'localeId'
                    parameter value
                  type: string
                ui_options:
                  description: User interface options data
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - hide_logo
                    - hide_tos
                    - hide_remember_me
                    - external_popup
                    - old_ui
                scope:
                  type: string
                accept_language:
                  type: string
                request:
                  type: string
                request_uri:
                  type: string
                nonce:
                  type: string
                code_challenge:
                  type: string
                code_challenge_method:
                  type: string
              required:
                - response_type
                - redirect_uri
                - client_id
      responses:
        "302":
          description: Found
      summary: Authorize
      tags:
        - OAuth 2.0
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: Free
  /restapi/oauth/revoke:
    post:
      description: Revokes access/refresh token. Requests to this endpoint must be
        authenticated with HTTP Basic scheme using the application key and
        application secret as login and password, correspondingly.
      operationId: revokeToken
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                client_assertion_type:
                  type: string
                client_assertion:
                  type: string
                token:
                  description: Active access or refresh token to be revoked
                  type: string
              required:
                - token
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
      summary: Revoke Token
      tags:
        - OAuth 2.0
      x-api-group: oauth/revoke
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: Free
      x-throttling-group: Auth
  /restapi/oauth/token:
    post:
      description: Returns access tokens for making API requests
      operationId: getToken
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                username:
                  description: Phone number linked to an account or extension in E.164
                    format with or without leading '+' sign
                  type: string
                password:
                  description: User's password
                  type: string
                  format: password
                extension:
                  description: Optional. Extension short number. If company number is
                    specified as a username, and extension is not specified, the
                    server will attempt to authenticate client as main company
                    administrator
                  type: string
                grant_type:
                  description: Grant type
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - authorization_code
                    - password
                    - refresh_token
                    - client_credentials
                  default: password
                code:
                  description: Authorization code
                  type: string
                redirect_uri:
                  description: This is a callback URI which determines where the response
                    is sent. The value of this parameter must exactly match one
                    of the URIs you have provided for your app upon registration
                  type: string
                access_token_ttl:
                  description: Access token lifetime in seconds
                  type: integer
                  format: int64
                  minimum: 600
                  maximum: 3600
                  default: 3600
                refresh_token_ttl:
                  description: Refresh token lifetime in seconds
                  type: integer
                  format: int64
                  maximum: 604800
                  default: 604800
                scope:
                  description: List of API permissions to be used with access token. Can be
                    omitted when requesting all permissions defined during the
                    application registration phase
                  type: string
                refresh_token:
                  description: Previously issued refresh token. This is the only formData
                    field used for the Refresh Token Flow.
                  type: string
                endpoint_id:
                  description: The unique identifier of a client application. If not
                    specified, the previously specified or auto generated value
                    is used by default
                  type: string
                pin:
                  type: string
                client_id:
                  type: string
                account_id:
                  type: string
                partner_account_id:
                  type: string
                client_assertion_type:
                  type: string
                client_assertion:
                  type: string
                assertion:
                  type: string
                brand_id:
                  type: string
                code_verifier:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Access/Refresh Tokens
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/TokenInfo"
        "400":
          description: |
            1. invalid_request: Unsupported grant type
            2. invalid_client: Bad Application Release Status: Blocked
        "415":
          description: Unsupported Media Type
        "429":
          description: Request rate exceeded
      summary: Get Token
      tags:
        - OAuth 2.0
      x-api-group: oauth/token
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Auth
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}":
    get:
      description: Returns basic information about a particular RingCentral customer
        account.
      operationId: readAccountInfo
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetAccountInfoResponse"
      summary: Get Account Info
      tags:
        - Company
      x-api-group: account
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadCompanyInfo
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadCompanyInfo
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/active-calls":
    get:
      description: Returns records of all calls that are in progress, ordered by start time
        in descending order.
      operationId: listCompanyActiveCalls
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: The direction for the result records. If not specified, both inbound
            and outbound records are returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - description: View of call records. The same view parameter specified for FSync
            will be applied for ISync, the view cannot be changed for ISync
          in: query
          name: view
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Simple
              - Detailed
            default: Simple
        - description: Call type of a record. If not specified, all call types are
            returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Voice
                - Fax
              type: string
        - description: Call transport type. 'PSTN' specifies that a call leg is initiated
            from the PSTN network provider; 'VoIP' - from an RC phone. By
            default this filter is disabled
          in: query
          name: transport
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - PSTN
                - VoIP
              type: string
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are accepted
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
        - description: Indicates the page size (number of items)
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 100
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyActiveCallsResponse"
      summary: Get Company Active Calls
      tags:
        - Call Log
      x-api-group: account/active-calls
      x-app-permission: ReadCallLog
      x-availability: Limited
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditAccountCallLog
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: ReadCallLog
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/answering-rule":
    get:
      description: Returns a list of company answering rules.
      operationId: listCompanyAnsweringRules
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are accepted
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
        - description: Indicates the page size (number of items per page)
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 100
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleList"
      summary: Get Company Call Handling Rule List
      tags:
        - Rule Management
      x-api-group: account/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadAccountAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: ReadCompanyAnsweringRules
    post:
      description: Creates a company answering rule for a particular caller ID.
      operationId: createCompanyAnsweringRule
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleRequest"
        description: JSON body
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleInfo"
      summary: Create Company Call Handling Rule
      tags:
        - Rule Management
      x-api-group: account/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: EditAccounts
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditAccountAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditCompanyAnsweringRules
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/answering-rule/{ruleId}":
    delete:
      description: Deletes a company custom answering rule by a particular ID.
      operationId: deleteCompanyAnsweringRule
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an answering rule
          in: path
          name: ruleId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "204":
          description: No Content
      summary: Delete Company Call Handling Rule
      tags:
        - Rule Management
      x-api-group: account/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: EditAccounts
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditAccountAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditCompanyAnsweringRules
    get:
      description: Returns a company answering rule by ID.
      operationId: readCompanyAnsweringRule
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an answering rule. The value can be standard
            digital ID or specific ID - either 'business-hours-rule' or
            'after-hours-rule'
          in: path
          name: ruleId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleInfo"
      summary: Get Company Call Handling Rule
      tags:
        - Rule Management
      x-api-group: account/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadAccountAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadCompanyAnsweringRules
    put:
      description: Updates a company answering rule.
      operationId: updateCompanyAnsweringRule
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an answering rule. The value can be standard
            digital ID or specific ID - either 'business-hours-rule' or
            'after-hours-rule'
          in: path
          name: ruleId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleUpdate"
        description: JSON body
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyAnsweringRuleInfo"
      summary: Update Company Call Handling Rule
      tags:
        - Rule Management
      x-api-group: account/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: EditAccounts
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditAccountAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditCompanyAnsweringRules
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/business-address":
    get:
      description: Returns business address of a company.
      operationId: readAccountBusinessAddress
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountBusinessAddressResource"
      summary: Get Account Business Address
      tags:
        - Company
      x-api-group: account/business-address
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadCompanyInfo
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadCompanyInfo
    put:
      description: Updates the business address of a company that account is linked to.
        Batch request is supported.
      operationId: updateAccountBusinessAddress
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ModifyAccountBusinessAddressRequest"
        description: JSON body
        required: true
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountBusinessAddressResource"
      summary: Update Company Business Address
      tags:
        - Company
      x-api-group: account/business-address
      x-app-permission: EditAccounts
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditCompanyInfo
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditCompanyInfo
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/business-hours":
    get:
      description: Returns company hours when answering rules are to be applied.
      operationId: readCompanyBusinessHours
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyBusinessHours"
      summary: Get Company Business Hours
      tags:
        - Business Hours
      x-api-group: extension/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadExtensionAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadUserAnsweringRules
    put:
      description: Updates company hours when answering rules are to be applied.
      operationId: updateCompanyBusinessHours
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyBusinessHoursUpdateRequest"
        description: JSON body
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyBusinessHours"
      summary: Update Company Business Hours
      tags:
        - Business Hours
      x-api-group: extension/answering-rule
      x-app-permission: EditExtensions
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditExtensionAnsweringRules
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditUserAnsweringRules
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/call-log":
    get:
      description: Returns call log records filtered by parameters specified.
      operationId: readCompanyCallLog
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Extension number of a user. If specified, returns call log for a
            particular extension only
          in: query
          name: extensionNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Phone number of a caller/call recipient. If specified, returns all
            calls (both incoming and outcoming) with the phone number specified.
            Cannot be specified together with the extensionNumber filter
          in: query
          name: phoneNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The direction for the result records. If not specified, both inbound
            and outbound records are returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - description: Call type of a record. If not specified, all call types are
            returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Voice
                - Fax
              type: string
        - description: View of call records. The same view parameter specified for FSync
            will be applied for ISync, the view cannot be changed for ISync
          in: query
          name: view
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Simple
              - Detailed
            default: Simple
        - description: "**Deprecated**. Supported for compatibility reasons only. `true` if
            only recorded calls are returned. The default value is `false`. If
            both `withRecording` and `recordingType` are specified,
            `withRecording` is ignored"
          in: query
          name: withRecording
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - description: Type of a call recording. If not specified, then calls without
            recordings are also returned
          in: query
          name: recordingType
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Automatic
              - OnDemand
              - All
        - description: The start datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601]  format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            dateTo minus 24 hours
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: The end datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601]  format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            current time
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are accepted
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
        - description: Indicates the page size (number of items)
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 100
        - description: Internal identifier of a call session
          in: query
          name: sessionId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountCallLogResponse"
      summary: Get Company Call Log Records
      tags:
        - Call Log
      x-api-group: account/call-log
      x-app-permission: ReadCallLog
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadAccountCallLog
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: FullCompanyCallLog
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/call-log-sync":
    get:
      description: Synchronizes company call log records.
      operationId: syncAccountCallLog
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Type of synchronization. 'FSync' is a default value
          in: query
          name: syncType
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            enum:
              - FSync
              - ISync
        - description: Value of syncToken property of last sync request response
          in: query
          name: syncToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The start datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601]  format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            the current moment
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: For 'FSync' the parameter is mandatory, it limits the number of
            records to be returned in response. For 'ISync' it specifies with
            how many records to extend sync frame to the past, the maximum
            number of records is 250
          in: query
          name: recordCount
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Type of calls to be returned.
          in: query
          name: statusGroup
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            enum:
              - Missed
              - All
        - description: View of call records. The same view parameter specified for FSync
            will be applied for ISync, the view cannot be changed for ISync
          in: query
          name: view
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Simple
              - Detailed
            default: Simple
        - description: Supported for ISync. If 'True' then deleted call records are returned
          in: query
          name: showDeleted
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountCallLogSyncResponse"

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/directory/entries":
    get:
      description: "Returns contact information on corporate users of federated accounts.
        Please note: 1. `User`, `DigitalUser`, `VirtualUser` and `FaxUser` types
        are returned as `User` type. 2. `ApplicationExtension` type is not
        returned. 3. Only extensions in `Enabled`, `Disabled` and `NotActivated`
        state are returned."
      operationId: listDirectoryEntries
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: If 'True' then contacts of all accounts in federation are returned.
            If 'False' then only contacts of the current account are returned,
            and account section is eliminated in this case
          in: query
          name: showFederated
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
        - description: Type of an extension
          in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - User
              - Department
              - Announcement
              - Voicemail
              - SharedLinesGroup
              - PagingOnly
              - IvrMenu
              - ParkLocation
              - Limited
        - description: Page number
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: "1"
        - description: "Records count to be returned per one page. The default value is
            1000. Specific keyword values: `all` - all records are returned in
            one page; `max` - maximum count of records that can be returned in
            one page"
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            maximum: 2000
            default: 1000
        - description: Internal identifier of the business site to which extensions belong
          in: query
          name: siteId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: If-None-Match
          in: header
          name: If-None-Match
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Paged collection of all contacts information for a given account.
            Records can be empty if no data found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DirectoryResource"
        "400":
          description: Current request cannot be processed due to error in its body and/or
            url.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"
        "500":
          description: Some unexpected error during current request processing.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"
        "503":
          description: Network error during request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse"
      summary: Get Company Directory Entries

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/emergency-address-auto-update/devices":
    get:
      description: Returns the list of common devices with their status of Automatic
        Location Updates feature.
      operationId: listDevicesAutomaticLocationUpdates
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of a site. To filter devices of Main Site
            (Company) `main-site` must be specified. Supported only If
            Multi-Site feature is enabled for the account
          in: query
          name: siteId
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Filters entries by their status of Automatic Location Updates feature
          in: query
          name: featureEnabled
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - description: Internal identifier of a device model for filtering. Multiple values
            are supported
          in: query
          name: model
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Filters devices which support HELD protocol
          in: query
          name: compatibleOnly
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - description: Filters entries which have device name or model name containing the
            mentioned substring. The value should be split by spaces; the range
            is 0 - 64 characters, not case-sensitive. If empty the filter is
            ignored
          in: query
          name: searchString
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: "Comma-separated list of fields to order results prefixed by plus
            sign '+' (ascending order) or minus sign '-' (descending order).
            Supported values: 'name', 'modelName', 'siteName', 'featureEnabled'"
          in: query
          name: orderBy
          schema:
            type: string
            default: name
        - description: "Indicates the page size (number of items). The values supported:
            `Max` or numeric value. If not specified, 100 records are returned
            per one page"
          in: query
          name: perPage
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are supported
          in: query
          name: page
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device List with their status of Automatic Location Updates feature
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ListDevicesAutomaticLocationUpdates"

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/call-log":
    delete:
      description: Deletes filtered call log records.
      operationId: deleteUserCallLog
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an extension or tilde (~) to indicate the
            extension assigned to the account logged-in within the current
            session
          in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: The end datetime for records deletion in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601]  format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            current time
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - in: query
          name: phoneNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: extensionNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Voice
                - Fax
              type: string
        - in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
      summary: Delete User Call Log
      tags:
        - Call Log
      x-api-group: extension/call-log
      x-app-permission: EditCallLog
      x-availability: Limited
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditExtensionCallLog
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: EditCallLog
    get:
      description: Returns call log records filtered by parameters specified.
      operationId: readUserCallLog
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an extension or tilde (~) to indicate the
            extension assigned to the account logged-in within the current
            session
          in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Extension number of a user. If specified, returns call log for a
            particular extension only
          in: query
          name: extensionNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: If 'True' then calls from/to blocked numbers are returned
          in: query
          name: showBlocked
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
        - description: Phone number of a caller/callee. If specified, returns all calls
            (both incoming and outcoming) with the phone number specified
          in: query
          name: phoneNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The direction for the resulting records. If not specified, both
            inbound and outbound records are returned. Multiple values are
            accepted
          in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - description: Internal identifier of a session
          in: query
          name: sessionId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Call type of a record. It is allowed to specify more than one type.
            If not specified, all call types are returned. Multiple values are
            accepted
          in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Voice
                - Fax
              type: string
        - description: Call transport type. 'PSTN' specifies that a call leg is initiated
            from the PSTN network provider; 'VoIP' - from an RC phone. By
            default this filter is disabled
          in: query
          name: transport
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - PSTN
                - VoIP
              type: string
        - description: View of call records. The same view parameter specified for FSync
            will be applied for ISync, the view cannot be changed for ISync
          in: query
          name: view
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Simple
              - Detailed
            default: Simple
        - description: "**Deprecated**. Supported for compatibility reasons. `True` if only
            recorded calls are returned. If both `withRecording` and
            `recordingType` are specified, then `withRecording` is ignored"
          in: query
          name: withRecording
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
        - description: Type of a call recording. If not specified, then calls without
            recordings are also returned
          in: query
          name: recordingType
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Automatic
              - OnDemand
              - All
        - description: The end datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601] format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            current time
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: The start datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601] format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            dateTo minus 24 hours
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are allowed
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
        - description: Indicates the page size (number of items)
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 100
        - description: If 'True' then deleted calls are returned
          in: query
          name: showDeleted
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserCallLogResponse"

      tags:
        - Call Log
      x-api-group: extension/call-log
      x-app-permission: ReadCallLog
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadExtensionCallLog
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: ReadCallLog
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/call-log-sync":
    get:
      description: Synchronizes call log records
      operationId: syncUserCallLog
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an extension or tilde (~) to indicate the
            extension assigned to the account logged-in within the current
            session
          in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Type of synchronization
          in: query
          name: syncType
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - FSync
                - ISync
              type: string
        - description: Value of syncToken property of last sync request response
          in: query
          name: syncToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The start datetime for resulting records in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601] format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            the current moment
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: For 'FSync' the parameter is mandatory, it limits the number of
            records to be returned in response. For 'ISync' it specifies with
            how many records to extend sync Frame to the past, the maximum
            number of records is 250
          in: query
          name: recordCount
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Type of calls to be returned. The default value is 'All'
          in: query
          name: statusGroup
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Missed
                - All
              type: string
        - description: View of call records. The same view parameter specified for FSync
            will be applied for ISync, the view cannot be changed for ISync
          in: query
          name: view
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Simple
              - Detailed
            default: Simple
        - description: Supported for ISync. If 'True' then deleted call records are returned
          in: query
          name: showDeleted
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogSync"
      summary: Sync User Call Log
      tags:
        - Call Log
      x-api-group: extension/call-log-sync
      x-app-permission: ReadCallLog
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadExtensionCallLog
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: ReadCallLog

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/fax":
    post:
      description: Creates and sends/resends a fax message. Resend can be implemented if
        sending has failed. Fax attachment size (both single and total) is
        limited to 50Mb.
      operationId: createFaxMessage
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account (integer) or tilde (~)
            to indicate the account which was logged-in within the current
            session.
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Internal identifier of an extension (integer) or tilde (~) to
            indicate the extension assigned to the account logged-in within the
            current session
          in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                attachment:
                  description: File to upload
                  type: string
                  format: binary
                faxResolution:
                  description: Resolution of Fax
                  type: string
                  enum:
                    - High
                    - Low
                to:
                  description: To Phone Number
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: string
                sendTime:
                  description: Timestamp to send fax at. If not specified (current or the
                    past), the fax is sent immediately
                  type: string
                  format: date-time
                isoCode:
                  description: ISO Code. e.g UK
                  type: string
                coverIndex:
                  description: Cover page identifier. For the list of available cover page
                    identifiers please call the method Fax Cover Pages. If not
                    specified, the default cover page which is configured in
                    'Outbound Fax Settings' is attached
                  type: integer
                coverPageText:
                  description: Cover page text, entered by the fax sender and printed on
                    the cover page. Maximum length is limited to 1024 symbols
                  type: string
              required:
                - attachment
                - to
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Fax Message
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/FaxResponse"
      summary: Create Fax Message
      tags:
        - Fax
      x-api-group: extension/fax
      x-app-permission: Faxes
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: FaxSending
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: Time-based
      x-team: PLA Inno
      x-throttling-group: Heavy
      x-user-permission: OutboundFaxes
  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/features":
    get:
      description: >-
        Returns the list of supported features and information on their
        availability for the current extension. Specific feature(s) might be
        checked by providing `featureId` query param. Multiple values supported,
        format: `?featureId=Feature1&featureId=Feature2`. To get only available
        features in order to decrease response size, `availableOnly=true` query
        param might be specified.

        In case the feature is available for the current user, `"available": true` is returned in the response for the record with corresponding feature `id`. Otherwise, additional attribute `reason` is returned with the appropriate code:

        * `ServicePlanLimitation` - the feature not included to the account service plan;

        * `AccountLimitation` - the feature is turned off for the account;

        * `ExtensionTypeLimitation` - the feature is not applicable for the extension type;

        * `ExtensionLimitation` - the feature is not available for the extension, e.g., additional license required;

        * `InsufficientPermissions` - required permission not granted to the current user (not the one, who is specified in the URL, but the one who's access token is used);

        * `ConfigurationLimitation` - the feature is turned off for the extension, e.g., by the account administrator.


        Also, some feature may have some additional parameters, e.g., limits, which are returned in `params` attribute as a name-value collection:

            {
              "id": "HUD",
              "available": true,
              "params": [
                {
                  "name": "limitMax",
                  "value": "100"
                }
              ]
            }
      operationId: readUserFeatures
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: availableOnly
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
        - in: query
          name: featureId
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Feature List
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/FeatureList"
      summary: Get User Features
      tags:
        - Features
      x-api-group: features
      x-app-permission: ReadAccounts
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadExtensions
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: ReadExtensions

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/message-store":
    delete:
      description: Deletes conversation(s) by conversation ID(s). Batch request is
        supported, max number of IDs passed as query/path parameters is 50.
        Alternative syntax is supported - user converations can be deleted by
        passing multiple IDs in request body as an array of string, max number
        of conversation IDs passed in request body is 100. In this case asterisk
        is used in the path instead of IDs
      operationId: deleteMessageByFilter
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: conversationId
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - description: Messages received earlier then the date specified will be deleted.
            The default value is current datetime
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: Type of messages to be deleted
          in: query
          name: type
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Fax
              - SMS
              - VoiceMail
              - Pager
              - Text
              - All
            default: All
        - in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "204":
          description: No Content
      summary: Delete Conversation
      tags:
        - Message Store
      x-api-group: extension/message-store
      x-app-permission: EditMessages
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: EditMessages
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Medium
      x-user-permission: EditMessages
    get:
      description: Returns the list of messages from an extension mailbox.
      operationId: listMessages
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to
            indicate the account logged-in within the current session
          in: path
          name: accountId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Internal identifier of an extension or tilde (~) to indicate the
            extension assigned to the account logged-in within the current
            session
          in: path
          name: extensionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ~
        - description: Specifies the availability status for the resulting messages.
            Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: availability
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Alive
                - Deleted
                - Purged
              type: string
        - description: Specifies the conversation identifier for the resulting messages
          in: query
          name: conversationId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: The start datetime for resulting messages in ISO 8601 format
            including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The
            default value is dateTo minus 24 hours
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: The end datetime for resulting messages in ISO 8601 format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            current time
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: The direction for the resulting messages. If not specified, both
            inbound and outbound messages are returned. Multiple values are
            accepted
          in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - description: If 'True', then the latest messages per every conversation ID are
            returned
          in: query
          name: distinctConversations
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - description: The type of the resulting messages. If not specified, all messages
            without message type filtering are returned. Multiple values are
            accepted
          in: query
          name: messageType
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Fax
                - SMS
                - VoiceMail
                - Pager
                - Text
              type: string
        - description: The read status for the resulting messages. Multiple values are
            accepted
          in: query
          name: readStatus
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Read
                - Unread
              type: string
        - description: Indicates the page number to retrieve. Only positive number values
            are accepted
          in: query
          name: page
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 1
        - description: Indicates the page size (number of items)
          in: query
          name: perPage
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 100
        - description: The phone number. If specified, messages are returned for this
            particular phone number only
          in: query
          name: phoneNumber
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetMessageList"
      summary: Get Message List
      tags:
        - Message Store
      x-api-group: extension/message-store
      x-app-permission: ReadMessages
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadMessages
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-notifications:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/InboundMessageEvent"
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/InstantMessageEvent"
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageEvent"
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadMessages

        - description: Internal identifier of a message

          required: true

          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: The start datetime for resulting messages in ISO 8601 format
            including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The
            default value is dateTo minus 24 hours
          in: query
          name: dateFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: The end datetime for resulting messages in ISO 8601 format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. The default value is
            current time
          in: query
          name: dateTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
        - description: Direction for the resulting messages. If not specified, both inbound
            and outbound messages are returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: direction
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Inbound
                - Outbound
              type: string
        - description: If 'True', then the latest messages per every conversation ID are
            returned
          in: query
          name: distinctConversations
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - description: Type for the resulting messages. If not specified, all types of
            messages are returned. Multiple values are accepted
          in: query
          name: messageType
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Fax
                - SMS
                - VoiceMail
                - Pager
                - Text
              type: string
        - description: Limits the number of records to be returned (works in combination
            with dateFrom and dateTo if specified)
          in: query
          name: recordCount
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Value of syncToken property of last sync request response
          in: query
          name: syncToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Type of message synchronization
          in: query
          name: syncType
          required: false
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - FSync
                - ISync
              type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetMessageSyncResponse"
      summary: Sync Messages
      tags:
        - Message Store
      x-api-group: extension/message-sync
      x-app-permission: ReadMessages
      x-availability: High
      x-docs-level: Public
      x-feature: ReadMessages
      x-metered-api: true
      x-metering-group: System
      x-throttling-group: Light
      x-user-permission: ReadMessages

  "/restapi/v1.0/account/{accountId}/extension/{extensionId}/presence":
    get:
      description: "Returns presence status of an extension or several extensions by their
        ID(s). Batch request is supported. The 'presenceStatus' is returned as
        Offline (the parameters 'telephonyStatus', 'message', 'userStatus' and
        'dndStatus' are not returned at all) for the following extension types:
        Department/Announcement Only/Take Messages Only (Voicemail)/Fax
        User/Paging Only Group/Shared Lines Group/IVR Menu/Application
        Extension/Park Location.If the user requests his/her own presence
        status, the response contains actual presence status even if the status
        publication is turned off. Batch request is supported. For batch
        requests the number of extensions in one request is limited to 30. If
        more extensions are included in the request, the error code 400 Bad
        Request is returned with the logical error code InvalidMultipartRequest
        and the corresponding message 'Extension Presence Info multipart request
        is limited to 30 extensions'."

          schema:

          schema:
            type: string

        supervisor's device. Call session and party identifiers should be
        specified in path. Please note that for this method dual channel audio
        flow is supported, which means that you need to make one more request
        for monitoring the second participant of a call. And as a result of each

        header `p-rc-api-monitoring-ids` containing IDs of the monitored party
        and session. The flow is supported for calls with no more than 2
        participants.

            type: integer

            default: 30

  "/restapi/v1.0/glip/chats/{chatId}/tasks":
    get:
      description: Returns the list of tasks of the specified chat.
      operationId: listChatTasks
      parameters:
        - description: Internal identifier of a chat
          in: path
          name: chatId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The end datetime for resulting records in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, e.g. 2019-03-10T18:23:45Z
          in: query
          name: creationTimeTo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: now
        - description: The start datetime for resulting records in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, e.g. 2016-02-23T00:00:00
          in: query
          name: creationTimeFrom
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Internal identifier of a task creator
          in: query
          name: creatorId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - description: Task execution status
          in: query
          name: status
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              enum:
                - Pending
                - InProgress
                - Completed
              type: string
        - description: Task assignment status
          in: query
          name: assignmentStatus
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Unassigned
              - Assigned
        - description: Internal identifier of a task assignee
          in: query
          name: assigneeId
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - description: Task execution status by assignee(-s) specified in assigneeId
          in: query
          name: assigneeStatus
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - Pending
              - Completed
        - description: Token of the current page. If token is omitted then the first page
            should be returned
          in: query
          name: pageToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: Number of records to be returned per screen
          in: query
          name: recordCount
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 250
            default: 30
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/GlipTaskList"

        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/IVRMenuInfo"
      description: JSON body
      required: true
    GlipMessageAttachmentInfoRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GlipMessageAttachmentInfoRequest"
      required: true
    GlipEventCreate:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GlipEventCreate"
      required: true
  securitySchemes:
    OAuth2:
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        authorizationCode:
          authorizationUrl: https://platform.ringcentral.com/restapi/oauth/authorize
          tokenUrl: https://platform.ringcentral.com/restapi/oauth/token
          scopes: {}
    api_key:
      in: header
      name: api_key
      type: apiKey
  schemas:
    APNSInfo:

      type: object
    APSInfo:
      properties:
