            application is in background
          type: integer
      type: object
    AccountBusinessAddressResource:
      properties:
        businessAddress:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ContactBusinessAddressInfo"
        company:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        mainSiteName:
          description: Custom site name
          type: string
        uri:
          format: uri
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountCallLogResponse:
      properties:
        navigation:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogNavigationInfo"
        paging:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogPagingInfo"
        records:
          description: List of call log records
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyCallLogRecord"
          type: array
        uri:
          description: Link to the list of company call log records
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountCallLogSyncResponse:
      properties:
        records:
          description: List of call log records with synchronization information. For
            'ISync' the total number of returned records is limited to 250; this
            includes both new records and the old ones, specified by the
            recordCount parameter
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyCallLogRecord"
          type: array
        syncInfo:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyCallLogSyncInfo"
      type: object
    AccountDeviceUpdate:
      properties:
        emergency:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceEmergencyInfo"
        emergencyServiceAddress:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/EmergencyServiceAddressResourceRequest"
        extension:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceUpdateExtensionInfo"
        phoneLines:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceUpdatePhoneLinesInfo"
        useAsCommonPhone:
          description: Supported only for devices assigned to Limited extensions. If true,
            enables users to log in to this phone as a common phone.
          type: boolean
      type: object
    AccountDirectoryProfileImageResource:
      properties:
        etag:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountLimits:
      properties:
        cloudRecordingStorage:
          description: Meetings recording cloud storage limitaion in Gb
          type: integer
        freeSoftPhoneLinesPerExtension:
          description: Max number of free softphone phone lines per user extension
          type: integer
        maxExtensionNumberLength:
          default: 5
          description: Max length of extension numbers of an account; the supported value
            is up to 8 symbols, depends on account type
          type: integer
        maxMonitoredExtensionsPerUser:
          description: Max number of extensions which can be included in the list of users
            monitored for Presence
          type: integer
        meetingSize:
          description: Max number of participants in RingCentral meeting hosted by this
            account's user
          type: integer
        shortExtensionNumberLength:
          description: Length of a short extension number
          type: integer
        siteCodeLength:
          description: Length of a site code
          type: integer
      type: object
    AccountPhoneNumbers:
      properties:
        navigation:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProvisioningNavigationInfo"
        paging:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProvisioningPagingInfo"
        records:
          description: List of account phone numbers
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CompanyPhoneNumberInfo"
          type: array
        uri:
          description: Link to the list of account phone numbers
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountPresenceEvent:
      properties:
        body:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountPresenceEventBody"
        event:
          description: Event filter URI
          type: string
        subscriptionId:
          description: Internal identifier of a subscription
          type: string
        timestamp:
          description: Datetime of sending a notification in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, for example *2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z*
          type: string
        uuid:
          description: Universally unique identifier of a notification
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountPresenceEventBody:
      properties:
        allowSeeMyPresence:
          description: If 'True' enables other extensions to see the extension presence
            status
          type: boolean
        dndStatus:
          description: Extended DnD (Do not Disturb) status
          enum:
            - TakeAllCalls
            - DoNotAcceptAnyCalls
            - DoNotAcceptDepartmentCalls
            - TakeDepartmentCallsOnly
          type: string
        extensionId:
          default: ~
          description: Internal identifier of an extension. Optional parameter
          type: string
        ownerId:
          description: Internal identifier of a subscription owner extension
          type: string
        pickUpCallsOnHold:
          description: If 'True' enables the extension user to pick up a monitored line on
            hold
          type: boolean
        presenceStatus:
          description: Aggregated presence status, calculated from a number of sources
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Busy
            - Available
          type: string
        ringOnMonitoredCall:
          description: If 'True' enables to ring extension phone, if any user monitored by
            this extension is ringing
          type: boolean
        sequence:
          description: Order number of a notification to state the chronology
          type: integer
        telephonyStatus:
          description: Telephony presence status. Returned if telephony status is changed.
          enum:
            - NoCall
            - CallConnected
            - Ringing
            - OnHold
            - ParkedCall
          type: string
        userStatus:
          description: User-defined presence status (as previously published by the user)
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Busy
            - Available
          type: string
      type: object
    AccountPresenceInfo:
      properties:
        navigation:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PresenceNavigationInfo"
        paging:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PresencePagingInfo"
        records:

          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetPresenceInfo"
          type: array
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of account presence resource
          type: string
      type: object

            - SuspendedVoluntarily
            - SuspendedInvoluntarily
            - UserResumed
          type: string

          description: Date until which the account will get deleted. The default value is

          type: string
      type: object
    ActiveCallInfo:
      properties:
        additional:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdditionalCQInfo"
        direction:
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        from:
          description: Phone number or extension number of a caller. For GCM transport type

          type: string
        fromName:
          description: Name of a caller
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        primary:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PrimaryCQInfo"
        sessionId:
          type: string
        sipData:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DetailedCallInfo"
        startTime:
          description: Time when the call is actually started
          type: string
        telephonyStatus:
          description: Telephony presence status
          enum:
            - NoCall
            - CallConnected
            - Ringing
            - OnHold
            - ParkedCall
          type: string
        terminationType:
          type: string
        to:
          description: Phone number or extension number of a callee
          type: string
        toName:
          description: Name of a callee
          type: string
      type: object
    ActiveCallInfoWithoutSIP:
      properties:
        direction:
          description: Call direction
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        from:
          description: Phone number or extension number of a caller. For GCM transport type
            '_from' property should be used
          type: string
        fromName:
          description: Name of a caller
          type: string
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a call
          type: string
        sessionId:
          description: Internal identifier of a call session
          type: string
        startTime:
          description: Time when the call is actually started
          type: string
        telephonyStatus:
          description: Telephony call status
          enum:
            - NoCall
            - CallConnected
            - Ringing
            - OnHold
            - ParkedCall
          type: string
        terminationType:
          description: Type of call termination. Supported for calls in 'NoCall' status. If
            the returned termination type is 'intermediate' it means the call is
            not actually ended, the connection is established on one of the
            devices
          enum:
            - final
            - intermediate
          type: string
        to:
          description: Phone number or extension number of a callee
          type: string
        toName:
          description: Name of a callee
          type: string
      type: object
    ActivePermissionResource:
      properties:

          description: Call screening status. 'Off' - no call screening; 'NoCallerId' - if

          enum:

            - AfterHours

          type: string

    CallHandlingNavigationInfo:
      properties:

        lastPage:

        nextPage:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallHandlingNavigationInfoUri"
        previousPage:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallHandlingNavigationInfoUri"
      type: object
    CallHandlingNavigationInfoUri:
      properties:
        uri:
          type: string
      type: object
    CallHandlingPagingInfo:
      properties:
        page:
          description: The current page number. 1-indexed, so the first page is 1 by
            default. May be omitted if result is empty (because non-existent
            page was specified or perPage=0 was requested)
          type: integer
        pageEnd:
          description: The zero-based index of the last element on the current page.
            Omitted if the page is omitted or result is empty
          type: integer
        pageStart:
          description: The zero-based number of the first element on the current page.
            Omitted if the page is omitted or result is empty
          type: integer
        perPage:
          description: Current page size, describes how many items are in each page.
            Default value is 100. Maximum value is 1000. If perPage value in the
            request is greater than 1000, the maximum value (1000) is applied
          type: integer
        totalElements:
          description: The total number of elements in a dataset. May be omitted for some
            resource due to performance reasons
          type: integer
        totalPages:
          description: The total number of pages in a dataset. May be omitted for some
            resources due to performance reasons
          type: integer
      type: object
    CallLogCallerInfo:
      properties:
        device:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordDeviceInfo"
        extensionId:
          description: Internal identifier of an extension
          type: string
        extensionNumber:
          description: Extension short number (usually 3 or 4 digits). This property is
            filled when parties communicate by means of short internal numbers,
            for example when calling to other extension or sending/receiving
            Company Pager message
          type: string
        location:
          description: Contains party location (city, state) if one can be determined from
            phoneNumber. This property is filled only when phoneNumber is not
            empty and server can calculate location information from it (for
            example, this information is unavailable for US toll-free numbers)
          type: string
        name:
          description: Symbolic name associated with a party. If the phone does not belong
            to the known extension, only the location is returned, the name is
            not determined then
          type: string
        phoneNumber:
          description: Phone number of a party. Usually it is a plain number including
            country and area code like 18661234567. But sometimes it could be
            returned from database with some formatting applied, for example
            (866)123-4567. This property is filled in all cases where parties
            communicate by means of global phone numbers, for example when
            calling to direct numbers or sending/receiving SMS
          type: string
      type: object
    CallLogNavigationInfo:
      properties:
        firstPage:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogNavigationInfoURI"
        lastPage:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogNavigationInfoURI"
        nextPage:

        previousPage:

      type: object
    CallLogNavigationInfoURI:
      properties:

          type: string
      type: object
    CallLogPagingInfo:
      properties:
        page:
          description: The current page number. 1-indexed, so the first page is 1 by
            default. May be omitted if result is empty (because non-existent
            page was specified or perPage=0 was requested)
          type: integer
        pageEnd:
          description: The zero-based index of the last element on the current page.
            Omitted if the page is omitted or result is empty
          type: integer
        pageStart:
          description: The zero-based number of the first element on the current page.
            Omitted if the page is omitted or result is empty
          type: integer
        perPage:
          default: 100
          description: Current page size, describes how many items are in each page.
            Maximum value is 1000. If perPage value in the request is greater
            than 1000, the maximum value (1000) is applied

        totalElements:

          type: integer
        totalPages:

    CallLogRecordLegInfo:
      properties:
        action:
          description: Action description of the call operation
          enum:
            - Unknown
            - Phone Call
            - Phone Login
            - Incoming Fax
            - Accept Call
            - External Application
            - FindMe
            - FollowMe
            - Outgoing Fax
            - CallOut-CallMe
            - Call Return
            - Calling Card
            - Monitoring
            - Ring Directly
            - RingOut Web
            - Text Relay
            - VoIP Call
            - RingOut PC
            - RingMe
            - Transfer
            - 411 Info
            - Emergency
            - E911 Update
            - Support
            - RingOut Mobile
            - MeetingsCall
            - SilentMonitoring
          type: string
        billing:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/BillingInfo"
        delegate:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DelegateInfo"
        direction:
          description: Call direction
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        duration:
          description: Call duration in seconds
          type: integer
        extension:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ExtensionInfoCallLog"
        extensionId:
          description: Internal identifier of an extension
          type: string
        from:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogCallerInfo"
        legType:
          description: Leg type
          enum:
            - SipForwarding
            - ServiceMinus2
            - ServiceMinus3
            - PstnToSip
            - Accept
            - FindMe
            - FollowMe
            - TestCall
            - FaxSent
            - CallBack
            - CallingCard
            - RingDirectly
            - RingOutWebToSubscriber
            - RingOutWebToCaller
            - SipToPstnMetered
            - RingOutClientToSubscriber
            - RingOutClientToCaller
            - RingMe
            - TransferCall
            - SipToPstnUnmetered
            - RingOutDeviceToSubscriber
            - RingOutDeviceToCaller
            - RingOutOneLegToCaller
            - ExtensionToExtension
            - CallPark
            - PagingServer
            - Hunting
            - OutgoingFreeSpDl
            - ParkLocation
            - ConferenceCall
            - MobileApp
            - Monitoring
            - MoveToConference
            - Unknown
          type: string
        master:
          description: Returned for 'Detailed' call log. Specifies if the leg is master-leg
          type: boolean
        message:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordMessage"
        reason:
          description: >
            Reason of a call result:
             * `Accepted` - The call was connected to and accepted by this number
             * `Connected` - The call was answered, but there was no response on how to handle the call (for example, a voice mail system answered the call and did not push "1" to accept)
             * `Line Busy` - The phone number you dialed was busy
             * `Not Answered` - The phone number you dialed was not answered
             * `No Answer` - You did not answer the call
             * `Hang Up` - The caller hung up before the call was answered
             * `Stopped` - This attempt was stopped because the call was answered by another phone
             * `Internal Error` - An internal error occurred when making the call. Please try again
             * `No Credit` - There was not enough Calling Credit on your account to make this call
             * `Restricted Number` - The number you dialed is restricted by RingCentral
             * `Wrong Number` - The number you dialed has either been disconnected or is not a valid phone number. Please check the number and try again
             * `International Disabled` - International calling is not enabled on your account. Contact customer service to activate International Calling
             * `International Restricted` - The country and/or area you attempted to call has been prohibited by your administrator
             * `Bad Number` - An error occurred when making the call. Please check the number before trying again
             * `Info 411 Restricted` - Calling to 411 Information Services is restricted
             * `Customer 611 Restricted` - 611 customer service is not supported. Please contact customer service at <(888) 555-1212>
             * `No Digital Line` - This DigitalLine was either not plugged in or did not have an internet connection
             * `Failed Try Again` - Call failed. Please try again
             * `Max Call Limit` - The number of simultaneous calls to your account has reached its limit
             * `Too Many Calls` - The number of simultaneous calls for per DigitalLine associated with Other Phone has reached its limit. Please contact customer service
             * `Calls Not Accepted` - Your account was not accepting calls at this time
             * `Number Not Allowed` - The number that was dialed to access your account is not allowed
             * `Number Blocked` - This number is in your Blocked Numbers list
             * `Number Disabled` - The phone number and/or area you attempted to call has been prohibited by your administrator
             * `Resource Error` - An error occurred when making the call. Please try again
             * `Call Loop` - A call loop occurred due to an incorrect call forwarding configuration. Please check that you are not forwarding calls back to your own account
             * `Fax Not Received` - An incoming fax could not be received because a proper connection with the sender's fax machine could not be established
             * `Fax Partially Sent` - The fax was only partially sent. Possible explanations include phone line quality to poor to maintain the connection or the call was dropped
             * `Fax Not Sent` - An attempt to send the fax was made, but could not connect with the receiving fax machine
             * `Fax Poor Line` - An attempt to send the fax was made, but the phone line quality was too poor to send the fax
             * `Fax Prepare Error` - An internal error occurred when preparing the fax. Please try again
             * `Fax Save Error` - An internal error occurred when saving the fax. Please try again
             * `Fax Send Error` - An error occurred when sending the fax. Please try again 
          enum:
            - Accepted
            - Connected
            - line Busy
            - Not Answered
            - No Answer
            - Hang Up
            - Stopped
            - Internal Error
            - No Credit
            - Restricted Number
            - Wrong Number
            - International Disabled
            - International Restricted
            - Bad Number
            - Info 411 Restricted
            - Customer 611 Restricted
            - No Digital Line
            - Failed Try Again
            - Max Call Limit
            - Too Many Calls
            - Calls Not Accepted
            - Number Not Allowed
            - Number Blocked
            - Number Disabled
            - Not Allowed
            - Resource Error
            - Call Loop
            - Fax Not Received
            - Fax Partially Sent
            - Fax Not Sent
            - Fax Poor Line
            - Fax Prepare Error
            - Fax Save Error
            - Fax Send Error
          type: string
        reasonDescription:
          type: string
        recording:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordingInfo"
        result:
          description: Status description of the call operation
          enum:
            - Unknown
            - Accepted
            - Call connected
            - In Progress
            - Voicemail
            - Reply
            - Missed
            - Busy
            - Rejected
            - No Answer
            - Hang Up
            - Blocked
            - Suspended account
            - Call Failed
            - Call Failure
            - Internal Error
            - IP Phone Offline
            - No Calling Credit
            - Not Allowed
            - Restricted Number
            - Wrong Number
            - Answered Not Accepted
            - Stopped
            - International Disabled
            - International Restricted
            - Abandoned
            - Declined
            - Received
            - Fax on Demand
            - Partial Receive
            - Receive Error
            - Fax Receipt Error
            - Sent
            - Fax Partially Sent
            - Send Error
            - Fax Not Sent
            - Fax Poor Line
          type: string
        shortRecording:
          description: Indicates that the recording is too short and therefore wouldn't be
            returned. The flag is not returned if the value is false
          type: boolean
        startTime:
          description: The call start datetime in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601] format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        telephonySessionId:
          description: Telephony identifier of a call session
          type: string
        to:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogCallerInfo"
        transport:
          description: Call transport
          enum:
            - PSTN
            - VoIP
          type: string
        type:
          description: Call type
          enum:
            - Voice
            - Fax
          type: string
      type: object
    CallLogRecordMessage:
      description: Linked message (Fax/Voicemail)

        partnerId:

            instead of regular RingCentral native IDs as path parameters using

    ExtensionDeviceResponse:
      properties:
        boxBillingId:
          description: Box billing identifier of a device. Applicable only for HardPhones.
            It is an alternative way to identify the device to be ordered.

            forT?HardPhone
          type: integer
        computerName:

            Parameter is not returned if `EmergencyAddressAutoUpdate` feature is
            not enabled for the account/user, or if device network location is
            not determined
          type: boolean

          description: Datetime of receiving last location report in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, for example *2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          type: string

          description: Pooling type of a deviceHost - device with standalone paid phone
            line which can be linked to Glip/Softphone instanceGuest - device
            with a linked phone lineNone - device without a phone line or with
            specific line (free, BLA, etc.) = ['Host', 'Guest', 'None']
          enum:
            - Host
            - Guest
            - None
          type: string
        model:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ModelInfo"
        name:
          description: "Device name. Mandatory if ordering  SoftPhone  or  OtherPhone.

            model name is used as device name "
          type: string

          description: Phone lines information
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/PhoneLinesInfo"
          type: array

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShippingInfo"

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceSiteInfo"

            TP-ID [-AT-AC], where TP is device type (HP for RC HardPhone, DV for
            all other devices including softphone); ID - device model ID; AT
            -addon type ID; AC - addon count (if any). For example 'HP-56-2-2'
          type: string
        status:
          description: Device status
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Online
          type: string
        type:
          default: HardPhone
          description: Device type
          enum:

            - OtherPhone
            - HardPhone
            - Paging
          type: string

          type: string

    GetDeviceInfoResponse:

          type: string

            - Host
            - Guest
            - None

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ModelInfo"

          type: string

          description: Phone lines information
          items:

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceSiteInfo"

            TP-ID [-AT-AC], where TP is device type (HP for RC HardPhone, DV for
            all other devices including softphone); ID - device model ID; AT

          description: Device status
          enum:

            - Online

            - SoftPhone
            - OtherPhone
            - HardPhone
            - WebPhone
            - Paging

          description: Canonical URI of a device
          type: string

            enables users to log in to this phone as a common phone.
          type: boolean

    GetMessageInfoResponse:
      properties:
        attachments:
          description: The list of message attachments
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageAttachmentInfo"
          type: array
        availability:
          description: Message availability status. Message in 'Deleted' state is still
            preserved with all its attachments and can be restored. 'Purged'
            means that all attachments are already deleted and the message
            itself is about to be physically deleted shortly
          enum:
            - Alive
            - Deleted
            - Purged
          type: string
        conversation:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ConversationInfo"
        conversationId:
          description: SMS and Pager only. Identifier of a conversation the message belongs
            to
          type: integer
        coverIndex:
          description: Cover page identifier. For the list of available cover page
            identifiers please call the Fax Cover Pages method
          type: integer
        coverPageText:
          description: Cover page text, entered by the fax sender and printed on the cover
            page. Maximum length is limited to 1024 symbols
          type: string
        creationTime:
          description: Message creation datetime in ISO 8601 format including timezone, for
            example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        deliveryErrorCode:
          description: SMS only. Delivery error code returned by gateway
          type: string
        direction:
          description: Message direction. Note that for some message types not all
            directions are allowed. For example voicemail messages can be only
            inbound
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        faxPageCount:
          description: Fax only. Page count in a fax message
          type: integer
        faxResolution:
          description: Fax only. Resolution of a fax message. 'High' for black and white
            image scanned at 200 dpi, 'Low' for black and white image scanned at
            100 dpi
          enum:
            - High
            - Low
          type: string
        from:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageStoreCallerInfoResponseFrom"
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a message
          type: integer
        lastModifiedTime:
          description: The datetime when the message was modified on server in ISO 8601
            format including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        messageStatus:
          description: "Message status. Different message types may have different allowed
            status values. For outbound faxes the aggregated message status is
            returned: If status for at least one recipient is 'Queued', then
            'Queued' value is returned If status for at least one recipient is
            'SendingFailed', then 'SendingFailed' value is returned In other
            cases Sent status is returned"
          enum:
            - Queued
            - Sent
            - Delivered
            - DeliveryFailed
            - SendingFailed
            - Received
          type: string
        pgToDepartment:
          description: "'Pager' only. 'True' if at least one of the message recipients is
            'Department' extension"
          type: boolean
        priority:
          description: Message priority
          enum:
            - Normal
            - High
          type: string
        readStatus:
          description: Message read status
          enum:
            - Read
            - Unread
          type: string
        smsDeliveryTime:
          description: SMS only. The datetime when outbound SMS was delivered to
            recipient's handset in ISO 8601 format including timezone, for
            example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. It is filled only if the carrier
            sends a delivery receipt to RingCentral
          format: date-time
          type: string
        smsSendingAttemptsCount:
          description: SMS only. Number of attempts made to send an outbound SMS to the
            gateway (if gateway is temporary unavailable)
          type: integer
        subject:
          description: Message subject. For SMS and Pager messages it replicates message
            text which is also returned as an attachment
          type: string
        to:
          description: Recipient information
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageStoreCallerInfoResponseTo"
          type: array
        type:
          description: Message type
          enum:
            - Fax
            - SMS
            - VoiceMail
            - Pager
            - Text
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of a message
          type: string
        vmTranscriptionStatus:
          description: Voicemail only. Status of voicemail to text transcription. If
            VoicemailToText feature is not activated for account, the
            'NotAvailable' value is returned
          enum:
            - NotAvailable
            - InProgress

      properties:

          description: Information on active calls
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ActiveCallInfo"
          type: array

          description: If 'True' enables other extensions to see the extension presence
            status
          type: boolean
        dndStatus:
          description: Extended DnD (Do not Disturb) status. Cannot be set for
            Department/Announcement/Voicemail (Take Messages Only)/Fax
            User/Shared Lines Group/Paging Only Group/IVR Menu/Application
            Extension/Park Location extensions. The 'DoNotAcceptDepartmentCalls'
            and 'TakeDepartmentCallsOnly' values are applicable only for
            extensions - members of a Department; if these values are set for
            department outsiders, the 400 Bad Request error code is returned.
            The 'TakeDepartmentCallsOnly' status can be set through the old
            RingCentral user interface and is available for some migrated
            accounts only.
          enum:
            - TakeAllCalls
            - DoNotAcceptAnyCalls
            - DoNotAcceptDepartmentCalls
            - TakeDepartmentCallsOnly
          type: string
        extension:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GetPresenceExtensionInfo"
        meetingStatus:
          description: RingCentral Meetings presence
          enum:
            - Connected
            - Disconnected
          type: string
        message:
          description: Custom status message (as previously published by user)
          type: string
        pickUpCallsOnHold:
          description: If 'True' enables the extension user to pick up a monitored line on
            hold
          type: boolean
        presenceStatus:
          description: Aggregated presence status, calculated from a number of sources
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Busy
            - Available
          type: string
        ringOnMonitoredCall:
          description: If 'True' enables to ring extension phone, if any user monitored by
            this extension is ringing
          type: boolean
        telephonyStatus:
          description: Telephony presence status
          enum:
            - NoCall
            - CallConnected
            - Ringing
            - OnHold
            - ParkedCall
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of a presence info resource
          type: string
        userStatus:
          description: User-defined presence status (as previously published by the user)
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Busy
            - Available
          type: string
      type: object

        type:

    MessageBody:
      properties:
        attachments:
          description: The list of message attachments
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageAttachmentInfo"
          type: array
        availability:
          description: Message availability status. Message in 'Deleted' state is still
            preserved with all its attachments and can be restored. 'Purged'
            means that all attachments are already deleted and the message
            itself is about to be physically deleted shortly
          enum:
            - Alive
            - Deleted
            - Purged
          type: string
        conversation:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ConversationInfo"
        conversationId:
          description: SMS and Pager only. Identifier of a conversation the message belongs
            to
          type: integer
        creationTime:
          description: Message creation datetime in ISO 8601 format including timezone, for
            example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        deliveryErrorCode:
          description: SMS only. Delivery error code returned by gateway
          type: string
        direction:
          description: Message direction. Note that for some message types not all
            directions are allowed. For example voicemail messages can be only
            inbound
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        faxPageCount:
          description: Fax only. Page count in a fax message
          type: integer
        faxResolution:
          description: Fax only. Resolution of a fax message. 'High' for black and white
            image scanned at 200 dpi, 'Low' for black and white image scanned at
            100 dpi
          enum:
            - High
            - Low
          type: string
        from:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageSenderInfo"
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a message
          type: string
        lastModifiedTime:
          description: The datetime when the message was modified on server in ISO 8601
            format including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        messageStatus:
          description: "Message status. Different message types may have different allowed
            status values.For outbound faxes the aggregated message status is
            returned: If status for at least one recipient is 'Queued', then
            'Queued' value is returned If status for at least one recipient is
            'SendingFailed', then 'SendingFailed' value is returned In other
            cases Sent status is returned"
          enum:
            - Queued
            - Sent
            - Delivered
            - DeliveryFailed
            - SendingFailed
            - Received
          type: string
        pgToDepartment:
          description: "'Pager' only. 'True' if at least one of the message recipients is
            'Department' extension"
          type: boolean
        priority:
          description: Message priority
          enum:
            - Normal
            - High
          type: string
        readStatus:
          description: Message read status
          enum:
            - Read
            - Unread
          type: string
        smsDeliveryTime:
          description: SMS only. The datetime when outbound SMS was delivered to
            recipient's handset in ISO 8601 format including timezone, for
            example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z. It is filled only if the carrier
            sends a delivery receipt to RingCentral
          format: date-time
          type: string
        smsSendingAttemptsCount:
          description: SMS only. Number of attempts made to send an outbound SMS to the
            gateway (if gateway is temporary unavailable)
          type: integer
        subject:
          description: Message subject. For SMS and Pager messages it replicates message
            text which is also returned as an attachment
          type: string
        to:
          description: Recipient information
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageRecipientInfo"
          type: array
        type:
          description: Message type
          enum:
            - Fax
            - SMS
            - VoiceMail
            - Pager
            - Text
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of a message
          type: string
        vmTranscriptionStatus:
          description: Voicemail only. Status of voicemail to text transcription. If
            VoicemailToText feature is not activated for account, the
            'NotAvailable' value is returned
          enum:
            - NotAvailable
            - InProgress
            - TimedOut
            - Completed
            - CompletedPartially
            - Failed
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageChanges:
      properties:
        newCount:
          description: The number of new messages. Can be omitted if the value is zero
          type: integer
        type:
          description: Message type
          enum:
            - Voicemail
            - SMS
            - Fax
            - Pager
          type: string
        updatedCount:
          description: The number of updated messages. Can be omitted if the value is zero
          type: integer
      type: object
    MessageEvent:
      properties:

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageEventBody"
        event:

          type: string
        subscriptionId:
          description: Internal identifier of a subscription
          type: string
        timestamp:
          description: Datetime of sending a notification in [ISO
            8601](shttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, for example *2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z*
          type: string
        uuid:
          description: Universally unique identifier of a notification
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageEventBody:
      properties:

            $ref: "#/components/schemas/MessageChanges"
          type: array
        extensionId:
          description: Internal identifier of an extension
          type: string
        lastUpdated:
          description: Datetime when the message was last modified in ISO 8601 format
            including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        ownerId:
          description: Internal identifier of a subscription owner extension
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageRecipientInfo:
      properties:
        extensionId:
          type: string
        extensionNumber:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageSenderInfo:
      properties:
        extensionId:
          type: string
        extensionNumber:

        name:
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageStoreCallerInfoRequest:
      properties:
        phoneNumber:

          type: string
      type: object
    MessageStoreCallerInfoResponseFrom:
      properties:
        extensionId:
          description: Internal identifier of an extension
          type: string
        extensionNumber:
          description: Extension short number (usually 3 or 4 digits). This property is
            filled when parties communicate by means of short internal numbers,
            for example when calling to other extension or sending/receiving
            Company Pager message
          type: string
        location:
          description: Contains party location (city, state) if one can be determined from
            phoneNumber. This property is filled only when phoneNumber is not
            empty and server can calculate location information from it (for
            example, this information is unavailable for US toll-free numbers)
          type: string
        name:
          description: Symbolic name associated with a party. If the phone does not belong
            to the known extension, only the location is returned, the name is
            not determined then
          type: string
        phoneNumber:
          description: Phone number of a party. Usually it is a plain number including
            country and area code like 18661234567. But sometimes it could be
            returned from database with some formatting applied, for example
            (866)123-4567. This property is filled in all cases where parties
            communicate by means of global phone numbers, for example when
            calling to direct numbers or sending/receiving SMS
          type: string
      type: object
    MessageStoreCallerInfoResponseTo:
      properties:
        extensionId:
          type: string
        extensionNumber:
          description: Extension short number (usually 3 or 4 digits). This property is
            filled when parties communicate by means of short internal numbers,
            for example when calling to other extension or sending/receiving
            Company Pager message
          type: string
        faxErrorCode:
          description: Error code returned in case of fax sending failure. Returned if
            messageStatus value is 'SendingFailed'. Supported for fax messages
            only
          enum:
            - AllLinesInUse
            - Undefined
            - NoFaxSendPermission
            - NoInternationalPermission
            - NoFaxMachine
            - NoAnswer
            - LineBusy
            - CallerHungUp
            - NotEnoughCredits
            - SentPartially
            - InternationalCallingDisabled
            - DestinationCountryDisabled
            - UnknownCountryCode
            - NotAccepted
            - InvalidNumber
            - CallDeclined
            - TooManyCallsPerLine
            - CallFailed
            - RenderingFailed
            - TooManyPages
            - ReturnToDBQueue
            - NoCallTime
            - WrongNumber
            - ProhibitedNumber
            - InternalError
            - FaxSendingProhibited
            - ThePhoneIsBlacklisted
            - UserNotFound
            - ConvertError
            - DBGeneralError
            - SkypeBillingFailed
            - AccountSuspended
            - ProhibitedDestination
            - InternationalDisabled
          type: string
        location:
          description: Contains party location (city, state) if one can be determined from
            phoneNumber. This property is filled only when phoneNumber is not
            empty and server can calculate location information from it (for
            example, this information is unavailable for US toll-free numbers)
          type: string
        messageStatus:
          description: Status of a message. Returned for outbound fax messages only
          enum:
            - Queued
            - Sent
            - Delivered
            - DeliveryFailed
            - SendingFailed
            - Received
          type: string
        name:
          description: Symbolic name associated with a party. If the phone does not belong
            to the known extension, only the location is returned, the name is
            not determined then
          type: string
        phoneNumber:
          description: Phone number of a party. Usually it is a plain number including
            country and area code like 18661234567. But sometimes it could be
            returned from database with some formatting applied, for example
            (866)123-4567. This property is filled in all cases where parties
            communicate by means of global phone numbers, for example when
            calling to direct numbers or sending/receiving SMS
          type: string
        target:
          description: "'True' specifies that message is sent exactly to this recipient.
            Returned in to field for group MMS. Useful if one extension has
            several phone numbers"
          type: boolean
      type: object
    MessageStoreConfiguration:
      properties:

          minimum: 7
          type: integer

        totalElements:
          description: The total number of elements in a dataset. May be omitted for some
            resource due to performance reasons
          type: integer
        totalPages:
          description: The total number of pages in a dataset. May be omitted for some
            resources due to performance reasons
          type: integer
      type: object

            - RC/APNS

            through the API by calling call control methods) then it cannot be
            fully muted/unmuted via API only, in this case the action should be
            duplicated via Hard phone/RC App interfaces

        holdAudioInterruptionPeriod:
          description: Connecting audio interruption message period in seconds
          type: integer
        holdTime:
          description: Maximum hold time in seconds to wait for an available call queue
            member
          type: integer
        holdTimeExpirationAction:
          default: Voicemail
          description: Specifies the type of action to be taken after the hold time
            (waiting for an available call queue member) expires. If
            'TransferToExtension' option is selected, the extension specified in
            `transfer` field is used
          enum:
            - TransferToExtension
            - UnconditionalForwarding
            - Voicemail
          type: string
        maxCallers:
          description: Maximum count of callers on hold; the limitation is 25 callers
          type: integer
        maxCallersAction:
          description: Action which should be taken if count of callers on hold exceeds the
            maximum
          enum:
            - Voicemail
            - Announcement
            - TransferToExtension
            - UnconditionalForwarding
          type: string
        noAnswerAction:
          type: string
        transfer:
          description: Call transfer information
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/TransferInfo"
          type: array
        transferMode:
          description: Specifies how calls are transferred to group members
          enum:
            - Rotating
            - Simultaneous
            - FixedOrder
          type: string
        unconditionalForwarding:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnconditionalForwardingInfo"
          type: array
        wrapUpTime:
          description: Minimum post-call wrap up time in seconds before agent status is
            automatically set; the value range is from 180 to 300
          type: integer
      type: object
    QueueShortInfoResource:
      properties:
        id:
          description: Call queue extension identifier

        name:

          type: string
      type: object

            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601), for example

            *2018-10-29T14:00:00+0100*
          type: string
        to:
          description: Ending datetime in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601), for example
            *2018-10-29T14:00:00*, *2018-10-29T14:00:00Z*,
            *2018-10-29T14:00:00+0100*
          type: string
      type: object
    ReasonInfo:
      properties:

            - ServicePlanLimitation
            - AccountLimitation
            - ExtensionTypeLimitation

            - InsufficientPermissions
            - ConfigurationLimitation
          type: string
        message:
          description: Reason description
          type: string
        permission:
          type: string
      type: object
    RecipientInfo:
      properties:

        uri:

      type: object

      properties:

      properties:

            - Weekly

            1-12 for `Weekly`; 1-3 for `Monthly`"

        monthlyByDay:
          description: The supported range is 1-31

        weeklyByDay:

            - Wednesday
            - Thursday
            - Friday
            - Saturday
          type: string
        weeklyByDays:
          description: Multiple values are supported, should be specified separated by comma

            - Monday
            - Tuesday
            - Wednesday
            - Thursday
            - Friday
            - Saturday

      type: object
    ReferenceInfo:

      properties:

            - CallMeBackLater
            - InAMeeting
            - OnTheOtherLineNoCall

            - Hour
            - Day

    RingOutStatusInfo:

            - TCP
            - TLS
            - WS
            - WSS
          type: string
      type: object
    SIPInfoResponse:
      properties:

          type: string

          description: The interval in seconds after which the app must try to switch back

          type: integer

          description: Preferred transport. SIP info will be returned for this transport if

          enum:
            - UDP
            - TCP
            - TLS

            - WSS

          description: User credentials

          description: Datetime of receiving last location report in [ISO

          type: string

            specific line (free, BLA, etc.) = ['Host', 'Guest', 'None']
          enum:
            - Host
            - Guest
            - None
          type: string

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DeviceModelInfo"

          description: "Device name. Mandatory if ordering  SoftPhone or OtherPhone.

            TP-ID [-AT-AC], where TP is device type (HP for RC HardPhone, DV for
            all other devices including softphone); ID - device model ID; AT
            -addon type ID; AC - addon count (if any). For example 'HP-56-2-2'
          type: string
        status:
          enum:
            - Online
            - Offline
          type: string
        type:

          enum:
            - HardPhone
            - SoftPhone
            - OtherPhone
            - Paging
            - WebPhone
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Link to a device resource
          type: string

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/RegionalSettings"
        uri:
          description: Link to a site resource
          type: string

    SpecificInfo:
      properties:

            notes, etc.) will be collected
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        contacts:
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DataExportTaskContactInfo"
          type: array
        timeFrom:
          description: Starting time for data collection
          type: string
        timeTo:
          description: Ending time for data collection
          type: string
      type: object
    SubscriptionInfo:
      properties:
        blacklistedData:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/NotificationBlacklistedData"
        certificateName:
          description: Name of a certificate. Supported for 'RC/APNS' and 'RC/GCM'
            transport types
          type: string
        creationTime:
          description: Subscription creation datetime in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        deliveryMode:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/NotificationDeliveryMode"
        disabledFilters:
          description: Collection of API resources (message-store/presence/detailed
            presence) corresponding to events the user is not subscribed to due
            to certain limitations
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DisabledFilterInfo"
          type: array
        eventFilters:
          description: Collection of API resources (message-store/presence/detailed
            presence) corresponding to events the user is subscribed to
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        expirationTime:
          description: Subscription expiration datetime in [ISO
            8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        expiresIn:
          default: 900
          description: Subscription lifetime in seconds
          type: integer
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a subscription
          type: string
        registrationId:
          description: Identifier of a registration. Supported for 'RC/APNS' and 'RC/GCM'
            transport types
          type: string
        status:
          description: Subscription status
          enum:
            - Active
            - Suspended
            - Blacklisted
          type: string
        transportType:
          description: Notifications transportation provider name
          enum:
            - PubNub
            - WebHook
            - RC/APNS
            - RC/GCM
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of a subscription
          type: string
      required:
        - deliveryMode
      type: object
    SuperviseCallSession:
      properties:
        accountId:
          description: Internal identifier of an account that monitors a call
          type: string
        direction:
          description: Direction of a call
          enum:
            - Outbound
            - Inbound
          type: string
        extensionId:
          description: Internal identifier of an extension that monitors a call
          type: string
        from:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PartyInfo"
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a party that monitors a call
          type: string
        muted:
          description: Specifies if a call participant is muted or not. **Note:** If a call
            is also controlled via Hard phone or RingCentral App (not only
            through the API by calling call control methods) then it cannot be
            fully muted/unmuted via API only, in this case the action should be
            duplicated via Hard phone/RC App interfaces
          type: boolean
        owner:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/OwnerInfo"
        standAlone:
          description: If 'True' then the party is not connected to a session voice
            conference, 'False' means the party is connected to other parties in
            a session
          type: boolean
        status:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallStatusInfo"
        to:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PartyInfo"
      type: object
    SuperviseCallSessionRequest:
      properties:

          description: Extension identifier of the user that will be monitored
          example: "400378008008"
          type: string
        agentExtensionNumber:
          description: Extension number of the user that will be monitored
          example: "105"
          type: string
        mode:
          description: Supervising mode
          enum:
            - Listen
          example: Listen
          type: string
        supervisorDeviceId:
          description: Internal identifier of a supervisor's device which will be used for
            call session monitoring
          example: "191888004"
          type: string
      required:
        - mode
        - deviceId
        - supervisorDeviceId
      type: object
    Supported:
      properties:

          default: false
          type: boolean
      type: object
    SwitchInfo:

        id:

    TokenInfo:
      properties:
        access_token:
          description: Access token to pass to subsequent API requests
          example: U1BCMDFUMDRKV1MwMXxzLFSvXdw5PHMsVLEn_MrtcyxUsw
          type: string
        endpoint_id:
          description: Application instance identifier
          example: 8zXq6oaLT7WvwWITlGiA1A
          type: string
        expires_in:
          description: Issued access token TTL (time to live), in seconds
          example: 7199
          type: integer
        id_token:
          type: string
        owner_id:
          description: Extension identifier
          example: "256440016"
          type: string
        refresh_token:
          description: Refresh token to get a new access token, when the issued one expires
          example: U1BCMDFUMDRKV1MwMXxzLFL4ec6A0XMsUv9wLriecyxS_w
          type: string
        refresh_token_expires_in:
          description: Issued refresh token TTL (time to live), in seconds
          example: 604799
          type: integer
        scope:
          description: List of permissions allowed with this access token, white-space
            separated
          example: AccountInfo CallLog ExtensionInfo Messages SMS
          type: string
        token_type:
          description: Type of token. The only possible value supported is Bearer. This
            value should be used when specifying access token in `Authorization`
            header of subsequent API requests
          example: bearer
          type: string
      type: object

            - Busy
          type: string
        telephony:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnifiedPresenceTelephony"
      type: object

      description: Returned if *Glip* feature is switched on

        availability:
          description: Shows whether user wants to receive Glip notifications or not.
          enum:
            - Available
            - DND
          type: string
        status:
          description: Glip connection status calculated from all user's apps. Returned
            always for the requester's extension; returned for another users if
            their glip visibility is set to 'Visible'
          enum:
            - Offline
            - Online
          type: string
        visibility:
          description: Visibility setting allowing other users to see the user's Glip
            presence status; returned only for requester's extension
          enum:
            - Visible
            - Invisible
          type: string
      type: object
    UnifiedPresenceList:
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnifiedPresenceListEntry"
      type: array

      properties:

          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnifiedPresence"
        resourceId:
          description: Internal identifier of the resource
          type: string
        status:
          description: Status code of resource retrieval
          type: integer
      type: object
    UnifiedPresenceMeeting:
      description: Returned if *Meetings* feature is switched on
      properties:
        status:
          description: Meeting status calculated from all user`s meetings
          enum:
            - NoMeeting
            - InMeeting
          type: string
      type: object
    UnifiedPresenceTelephony:
      description: Returned if *BLF* feature is switched on
      properties:
        availability:
          description: Telephony DND status. Returned if *DND* feature is switched on
          enum:
            - TakeAllCalls
            - DoNotAcceptAnyCalls
            - DoNotAcceptQueueCalls
          type: string
        status:
          description: Telephony status calculated from all user's phone numbers. Returned
            always for the requester's extension; returned for another users if
            their telephony visibility is set to 'Visible'
          enum:
            - NoCall
            - Ringing
            - CallConnected
            - OnHold
            - ParkedCall
          type: string
        visibility:
          description: Specifies if the user hardphone presence status is visible to other
            users; returned only for requester's extension
          enum:
            - Visible
            - Invisible
          type: string
      type: object
    UpdateAnsweringRuleRequest:
      properties:
        callHandlingAction:
          description: Specifies how incoming calls are forwarded
          enum:
            - ForwardCalls
            - UnconditionalForwarding
            - AgentQueue
            - TransferToExtension
            - TakeMessagesOnly
            - PlayAnnouncementOnly
            - SharedLines
          type: string
        calledNumbers:
          description: Answering rules are applied when calling to selected number(s)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CalledNumberInfo"
          type: array
        callers:
          description: Answering rule will be applied when calls are received from the
            specified caller(s)
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallersInfoRequest"
          type: array
        enabled:
          description: Specifies if the rule is active or inactive. The default value is
            'True'
          type: boolean
        forwarding:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ForwardingInfoCreateRuleRequest"
        greetings:
          description: Greetings applied for an answering rule; only predefined greetings
            can be applied, see Dictionary Greeting List
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GreetingInfo"
          type: array
        id:
          description: Identifier of an answering rule
          type: string
        name:
          description: Name of an answering rule specified by user
          type: string
        queue:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/QueueInfo"
        schedule:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ScheduleInfo"
        screening:
          description: Call screening status. 'Off' - no call screening; 'NoCallerId' - if
            caller ID is missing, then callers are asked to say their name
            before connecting; 'UnknownCallerId' - if caller ID is not in
            contact list, then callers are asked to say their name before
            connecting; 'Always' - the callers are always asked to say their
            name before connecting. The default value is 'Off'
          enum:
            - Off
            - NoCallerId
            - UnknownCallerId
            - Always
          type: string
        showInactiveNumbers:
          description: Indicates whether inactive numbers should be returned or not
          type: boolean
        transfer:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TransferredExtensionInfo"
        type:
          description: Type of an answering rule
          enum:
            - BusinessHours
            - AfterHours
            - Custom
          type: string
        unconditionalForwarding:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnconditionalForwardingInfo"
        voicemail:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/VoicemailInfo"
      type: object

        totalElements:

    UserCallLogRecord:
      properties:
        action:
          description: Action description of the call operation
          enum:
            - Unknown
            - Phone Login
            - Calling Card
            - VoIP Call
            - Phone Call
            - Paging
            - Hunting
            - Call Park
            - Monitoring
            - Text Relay
            - External Application
            - Park Location
            - CallOut-CallMe
            - Conference Call
            - Move
            - RC Meetings
            - Accept Call
            - FindMe
            - FollowMe
            - RingMe
            - Transfer
            - Call Return
            - Ring Directly
            - RingOut Web
            - RingOut PC
            - RingOut Mobile
            - Emergency
            - E911 Update
            - Support
            - Incoming Fax
            - Outgoing Fax
          type: string
        billing:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/BillingInfo"
        delegate:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/DelegateInfo"
        deleted:
          description: Indicates whether the record is deleted. Returned for deleted
            records, for ISync requests
          type: boolean
        direction:
          description: Call direction
          enum:
            - Inbound
            - Outbound
          type: string
        duration:
          description: Call duration in seconds
          type: integer
        extension:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ExtensionInfoCallLog"
        from:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogCallerInfo"
        id:
          description: Internal identifier of a cal log record
          type: string
        lastModifiedTime:
          description: For 'Detailed' view only. The datetime when the call log record was
            modified in (ISO 8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601]
            format including timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          format: date-time
          type: string
        legs:
          description: For 'Detailed' view only. Leg description
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordLegInfo"
          type: array
        message:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordMessage"
        reason:
          description: >
            Reason of a call result:
             * `Accepted` - The call was connected to and accepted by this number
             * `Connected` - The call was answered, but there was no response on how to handle the call (for example, a voice mail system answered the call and did not push "1" to accept)
             * `Line Busy` - The phone number you dialed was busy
             * `Not Answered` - The phone number you dialed was not answered
             * `No Answer` - You did not answer the call
             * `Hang Up` - The caller hung up before the call was answered
             * `Stopped` - This attempt was stopped because the call was answered by another phone
             * `Internal Error` - An internal error occurred when making the call. Please try again
             * `No Credit` - There was not enough Calling Credit on your account to make this call
             * `Restricted Number` - The number you dialed is restricted by RingCentral
             * `Wrong Number` - The number you dialed has either been disconnected or is not a valid phone number. Please check the number and try again
             * `International Disabled` - International calling is not enabled on your account. Contact customer service to activate International Calling
             * `International Restricted` - The country and/or area you attempted to call has been prohibited by your administrator
             * `Bad Number` - An error occurred when making the call. Please check the number before trying again
             * `Info 411 Restricted` - Calling to 411 Information Services is restricted
             * `Customer 611 Restricted` - 611 customer service is not supported. Please contact customer service at <(888) 555-1212>
             * `No Digital Line` - This DigitalLine was either not plugged in or did not have an internet connection
             * `Failed Try Again` - Call failed. Please try again
             * `Max Call Limit` - The number of simultaneous calls to your account has reached its limit
             * `Too Many Calls` - The number of simultaneous calls for per DigitalLine associated with Other Phone has reached its limit. Please contact customer service
             * `Calls Not Accepted` - Your account was not accepting calls at this time
             * `Number Not Allowed` - The number that was dialed to access your account is not allowed
             * `Number Blocked` - This number is in your Blocked Numbers list
             * `Number Disabled` - The phone number and/or area you attempted to call has been prohibited by your administrator
             * `Resource Error` - An error occurred when making the call. Please try again
             * `Call Loop` - A call loop occurred due to an incorrect call forwarding configuration. Please check that you are not forwarding calls back to your own account
             * `Fax Not Received` - An incoming fax could not be received because a proper connection with the sender's fax machine could not be established
             * `Fax Partially Sent` - The fax was only partially sent. Possible explanations include phone line quality to poor to maintain the connection or the call was dropped
             * `Fax Not Sent` - An attempt to send the fax was made, but could not connect with the receiving fax machine
             * `Fax Poor Line` - An attempt to send the fax was made, but the phone line quality was too poor to send the fax
             * `Fax Prepare Error` - An internal error occurred when preparing the fax. Please try again
             * `Fax Save Error` - An internal error occurred when saving the fax. Please try again
             * `Fax Send Error` - An error occurred when sending the fax. Please try again
          enum:
            - Accepted
            - Connected
            - line Busy
            - Not Answered
            - No Answer
            - Hang Up
            - Stopped
            - Internal Error
            - No Credit
            - Restricted Number
            - Wrong Number
            - International Disabled
            - International Restricted
            - Bad Number
            - Info 411 Restricted
            - Customer 611 Restricted
            - No Digital Line
            - Failed Try Again
            - Max Call Limit
            - Too Many Calls
            - Calls Not Accepted
            - Number Not Allowed
            - Number Blocked
            - Number Disabled
            - Resource Error
            - Call Loop
            - Fax Not Received
            - Fax Partially Sent
            - Fax Not Sent
            - Fax Poor Line
            - Fax Prepare Error
            - Fax Save Error
            - Fax Send Error
          type: string
        reasonDescription:
          type: string
        recording:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogRecordingInfo"
        result:
          description: Status description of the call operation
          enum:
            - Unknown
            - Accepted
            - Call connected
            - In Progress
            - Voicemail
            - Reply
            - Missed
            - Busy
            - Rejected
            - No Answer
            - Hang Up
            - Blocked
            - Suspended account
            - Call Failed
            - Call Failure
            - Internal Error
            - IP Phone Offline
            - No Calling Credit
            - Not Allowed
            - Restricted Number
            - Wrong Number
            - Answered Not Accepted
            - Stopped
            - International Disabled
            - International Restricted
            - Abandoned
            - Declined
            - Received
            - Fax on Demand
            - Partial Receive
            - Receive Error
            - Fax Receipt Error
            - Sent
            - Fax Partially Sent
            - Send Error
            - Fax Not Sent
            - Fax Poor Line
          type: string
        sessionId:
          description: Internal identifier of a call session
          type: string
        shortRecording:
          description: Indicates that the recording is too short and therefore wouldn't be
            returned. The flag is not returned if the value is false
          type: boolean
        startTime:
          description: The call start datetime in (ISO
            8601)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601] format including
            timezone, for example 2016-03-10T18:07:52.534Z
          type: string
        telephonySessionId:
          description: Telephony identifier of a call session
          type: string
        to:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CallLogCallerInfo"
        transport:
          description: For 'Detailed' view only. Call transport
          enum:
            - PSTN
            - VoIP
          type: string
        type:
          description: Call type
          enum:
            - Voice
            - Fax
          type: string
        uri:
          description: Canonical URI of a call log record
          type: string
      type: object
